alert.note: Alert for Wayne (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued October 02 at 6:32PM MDT until October 02 at 7:15PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR WESTERN WAYNE COUNTY... At 632 PM MDT, Capitol Reef National Park reported flash flooding on Sulphur Creek from earlier heavy rainfall upstream. Flash flooding is ongoing. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Trained spotters reported. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Capitol Reef National Park and Fruita. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
